Title: Directs the division of veterans' services to establish a searchable database of veteran-owned businesses
Summary: Directs the division of veterans' services, with the aid and assistance of the office of general services, to establish a searchable database of veteran-owned businesses; requires the use of a special mark to indicate service-disabled veteran-owned businesses.
LawCode: Amd ยง353, Exec L; amd ยง4, Veterans' Services L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the veterans' services law, in relation to establishing a searchable database of veteran-owned businesses
